Text.Page:
I'll bet everyone this side of Castanica has been asking you to hunt out-of-control predators, huh? With the army gone and most of the civilians fled, they're running rampant.

Far be it from me to break the streak. Right now, {@LinkCreature:10#21#ebon sabertooths} are public enemy number one.

You know the drill, . Get to it!

Back already? You have been practicing, that's for sure. I almost feel sorry for the sabertooths.

Or is the plural "saberteeth?" I can never remember.
